item.title: How to Detect Click Through Rate Manipulation – A Guide
item.dc:creator: ctradmin
item.description: Uncovering click-through rate manipulation is crucial for maintaining the integrity of online analytics and marketing efforts. Click-through rate manipulation can lead to inaccurate data, wasted resources, and ultimately harm a business’s online reputation. In this comprehensive guide, we will explore into the key indicators and methods to detect and prevent click-through rate manipulation strategies used […]
item.content:encoded:
Uncovering click-through rate manipulation is crucial for maintaining the integrity of online analytics and marketing efforts. Click-through rate manipulation can lead to inaccurate data, wasted resources, and ultimately harm a business’s online reputation. In this comprehensive guide, we will explore into the key indicators and methods to detect and prevent click-through rate manipulation…

Source
